title: Cardiac-protected electrical areas
fullText:
A final sub-circuit used to supply LPD-protected socket-outlets and permanently wired medical electrical equipment in a cardiac-protected electrical area shall only be used in one patient location.
Exceptions:
1	Final sub-circuits supplying non-LPD protected socket-outlets.
2	Final sub-circuits supplying socket-outlets identified 'CLEANING PURPOSES ONLY' in accordance with Clause 2.7.3.
NOTE: See Section 6 for sub-circuit requirements for alterations, additions and repairs.
